properties.description: This pipeline is to join Customer and Address tables, and copy CSV into ADLS

activities.name: Join Customer and Address tables
activities.description: This pipeline is to join Customer and Address tables, and copy CSV into ADLS

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT A.CUSTOMERID, A.FIRSTNAME, C.AddressLine1||' '||AddressLine2||' '||City||' '||StateProvince||' '||CountryRegion||' '||PostalCode
FROM SALESLT.CUSTOMER A JOIN SALESLT.cUSTOMERAddress  B
ON A.CUSTOMERID = B.CUSTOMERID  
JOIN SalesLT.ADDRESS C ON B.ADDRESSID = C.ADDRESSID;
